title: The Dream Warrior
description: Sold as a child to the grotesque and sinister master thief Grimmel, Corri Farblood was forced into thievery at a young age. At eighteen, she's the best thief in the city of Hadliden -- but she also possesses an ability to travel the astral plane, called "dream-flying." Journey with Corri as she battles against time and her enemies to solve the mystery of her heritage and to confront a fate that will test her powers and courage to the limit.
author: D.J. Conway
